definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
to brush/to paint/to daub/to paste up/to skip class (of students)/to fire from a job
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: The influences of dry fading density phenomenon on the evaluation and control of presswork quality were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了幹退密度現象對印刷品質量評價及控制的影響。

sentences.english: Don’t get me wrong, I’m sad about the demise of print, too.
sentences.chinese: 別誤會我的意思，對於印刷品的消亡我也很難過。

sentences.english: I think that someone must have taken the wrong when print sent away.
sentences.chinese: 我想那一定是有人當印刷品拿錯了寄走了。

sentences.english: An effective way was offered for the presswork quality evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 爲印刷品質量評價提供了一種有效的方法。

sentences.english: The printing press helped diffuse scientific knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 印刷品有助於傳播科學知識。

sentences.english: These prints were produced in very large numbers from about 1425 onwards.
sentences.chinese: 這些印刷品產生了非常大的編號從約號開始。

sentences.english: The gold comes in the form of a crackled print.
sentences.chinese: 以一個有裂痕的印刷品的形式，金子來。

sentences.english: There have been several opportunities for Shang Ding to make "quick money" through the print programs.
sentences.chinese: 尚丁曾經有過若干次通過印刷品“致富”的機會。

sentences.english: Copy Writing (Chinese) for Brochure, Flyer, etc.
sentences.chinese: 爲廣告印刷品撰寫中文文宣。

sentences.english: Well, if there's no letter, the parcel can the sent as printed matter.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，如果沒夾有信件，這包裹可當作印刷品交寄。

sentences.english: Can I send these books as printed matter?
sentences.chinese: 我能不能把這些書做印刷品郵寄？
他盲目相信一切印刷品。

sentences.english: In the color printing, the appearance of moire has affected the print quality seriously.
sentences.chinese: 在彩色印刷中，龜紋的出現嚴重影響了印刷品的質量。

sentences.english: We can make any air fresheners and printed matters according to your needs.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以根據您的需要定做任何香片或紙製印刷品。

sentences.english: The basic processes of on-line defect detection for color printing were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹彩色印刷品圖像在線檢測的基本流程。

sentences.english: The print on the right wall was given to us by our brother-in-law, Nick.
sentences.chinese: 右面牆上的印刷品是我們姐夫Nick給我們的。

definition: printing plate/printed version (of a digital publication)/printing (as in "1st printing" etc)
color printing/abbr. for 彩色印刷[cai3 se4 yin4 shua1]
